articles.author: Dominick Reuter
articles.title: A business owner tested if customers would pay more for American-made. The results were 'sobering.' - Business Insider
articles.description: Afina founder Ramon van Meer wanted to see if people would buy a higher-priced, Made-in-USA version of his filtered shower head — so he ran a test.
articles.content:
As a small business owner, Ramon van Meer said he's used to hearing people say they'd be willing to pay more for products made in America.
When President Donald Trump ratcheted up tariffs on Chinese… [+2720 chars]

articles.title: Öztürk arrives at Logan Airport after 6 weeks in ICE detention - WBUR
articles.description: A day after a federal judge ordered her release, Öztürk said: "America is the greatest democracy in the world and I believe in those values that we share."
articles.content: Tufts University student Rümeysa Öztürk arrived at Logan Airport Saturday night, returning to Boston six weeks after immigration agents took her to a Louisiana detention center and the day after a Ve… [+2310 chars]

articles.author: J. Kim Murphy
articles.title: Box Office: ‘Thunderbolts*’ on Top Again in Second Weekend, ‘Sinners’ Crossing $200 Million Domestic - Variety
articles.description: Marvel's 'Thunderbolts*' is still on top of box office charts, while Ryan Coogler's 'Sinners' has now crossed the $200 million mark in North America.
articles.content:
“Thunderbolts*” will enjoy another weekend atop domestic box office charts, with no new major wide release until next week’s horror sequel “Final Destination: Bloodlines.”
